#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(

      default: "NONE"

    confirmSaveInto: ri!confirmSaveInto,
    cancelSaveInto: ri!cancelSaveInto,

    cancelSubmit: true
  )
)

    originalObjects: ri!auditParams.originalObjects,
    newObjects: ri!auditParams.newObjects,
    objectTypeNumber: ri!auditParams.objectTypeNumber,

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to merge the ID-output of a WriteRecords SS node back to the input process variable.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord (see that description)
- In the output of a WriteRecords SS, do:
  A - New Custom Output
  B - rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: pv![the pv your wrote],
        recordsUpdated: ac!RecordsUpdated,
        fksToParent: {list of record fields that are FKs to the primary PK you wrote}
      )
  C - Save this back to the pv you wrote

MAPPING FKS:
- Using this rule in the current state, child-FKs can only be set 
where they map back to the primary record type, using input "fksToParent".
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case", 
    - you could set "Case.Comment.caseId"
    - you could set "Case.Comment.Replies.caseId"
    - but not "Case.Comment.Replies.commentId" (since the FK "commentId" is not the PK of "Case")
- To set other foreign keys, you would have to run manual update rules using the result of this.
Note:
- "fksToParent" is optimized for 1:M relationships.
  - Setting an fkToParent for a 1:1 will create an instance of that child record if it is null.

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The result of THIS rule will have data that IS considered changed, 
so a designer should be cautious about re-writing this later in process 
as it could cause race condition and performance side affects.

- Also, the result of this WILL NOT have custom-fields calculated, 
since they can be changed as a result of the write, but this rule is not re-querying.
If you need these, then re-query.

- This should generally only be used for downstream flows that don't write it directly again, 
such as document processing, emails, etc.
*/
if(
  or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)),
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
  ),
  if(
    count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)) = 0,
    ri!processData,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated))),
      expression: rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: a!flatten(ri!processData)[fv!index],
        recordsUpdated: cast(
          runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData)),
          ri!recordsUpdated
        )[fv!index],
        fksToParent: ri!fksToParent
      )
    )
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!keys: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!keys(ri!recordsUpdated),
      expression: a!map(
        key: fv!item,
        isPrimaryKey: runtimetypeof(fv!item) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordField'
      )
    ),
    local!keysOrganized: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
      records: local!keys,
      field: "isPrimaryKey",
      value: true,
      filterType: "FULL_RESULT"
    ),
    local!primaryKeyField: local!keysOrganized.firstMatch.key,
    local!updates: rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
      record: ri!processData,
      neverOverwrite: {
        a!map(
          field: local!primaryKeyField,
          value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField]
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!fksToParent,
          expression: a!map(
            field: fv!item,
            value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField],
            /*Children get complicated, and an update should only run if a child is actually attached*/
            applyWhen: a!match(
              value: runtimetypeof(ri!processData[fv!item]),
              equals: runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData[fv!item])),
              then: count(ri!processData[fv!item]) > 0,
              equals: tointeger(
                'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
              ),
              then: or(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: ri!processData[fv!item],
                  expression: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item)
                )
              ),
              default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!processData[fv!item])
            )
          )
        )
      },
      childRelationships: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!keysOrganized.rejects,
        expression: a!map(
          field: fv!item.key,
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!processData[fv!item.key]),
            ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
            rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
              processData: ri!processData[fv!item.key],
              recordsUpdated: ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
              fksToParent: {}
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    local!updates
  )
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_BL_constructHelperForClauseSetClauseAndClauseText
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  all(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank,
    { ri!clauses, ri!clauseTexts }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_initializeBlankLocalVariable(
    type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Helper'
  ),
  /*Combining AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause and AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Text*/
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!clauses,
    expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Helper',
      value: {
        relationId: fv!item.relationId,
        setId: fv!item.setId,
        refClause: fv!item.refClause,
        section: fv!item.section,
        refUsage: fv!item.refUsage,
        refStatus: fv!item.refStatus,
        refAddedVia: fv!item.refAddedVia,
        format: fv!item.format,
        effectiveDate: fv!item.effectiveDate,
        validationAction: fv!item.validationAction,
        clauseTitle: fv!item.clauseTitle,
        retainedEffectiveDate: fv!item.retainedEffectiveDate,
        alternateValue:fv!item.alternateValue,
        clauseText: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
          cdt: ri!clauseTexts,
          field: "relationId",
          value: index(fv!item, "relationId", null)
        ).clauseText,
        /*Metadata from both the CDTs would be the same. Using AS_GCM_R_Clause's data here*/
        createdBy: fv!item.createdBy,
        createdDatetime: fv!item.createdDatetime,
        modifiedBy: fv!item.modifiedBy,
        modifiedDatetime: fv!item.modifiedDatetime,
        isActive: fv!item.isActive
      }
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_ADT_BL_auditConfig_ClauseSetClauseHelper
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  fieldName: "clauses",
  auditFieldName: "clausesChanges",
  idField: "relationId",
  foreignIdField: "setId",
  simpleFields: {
    "setId",
    "refClause.clauseId",
    "section.sectionLabel",
    "clauseTitle",
    "alternateValue",
    "clauseText",
    "refUsage.refDataId",
    "refStatus.refDataId",
    "format.refDataId",
    "effectiveDate",
    "isActive",
    "validationAction"
  },
  complexFields: {}
}

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_clauseSetClauseStartAuditProcess_Parameters
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters(
  originalObjects: rule!AS_GCM_BL_constructHelperForClauseSetClauseAndClauseText(
    clauses: ri!originalClauses,
    clauseTexts: ri!originalClauseTexts
  ),
  newObjects: rule!AS_GCM_BL_constructHelperForClauseSetClauseAndClauseText(
    clauses: ri!clauses,
    clauseTexts: ri!clauseTexts
  ),
  objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Helper',
  auditDse: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_A_R_CLAUSE_SET,
  auditConfig: rule!AS_GCM_ADT_BL_auditConfig_ClauseSet(),
  /*Audit type - Manipulation as we capture the audit of clause nested under ClauseSet*/
  auditType: cons!AS_GAM_ADT_TXT_AUDIT_TYPE_MANIPULATION,
  externalAction: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!externalAction,
    replacementValue: cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY
  ),
  complexFieldName: "clausesChanges",
  username: ri!initiator
).auditParams

_a-0000eb85-3dbf-8000-9d30-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_BL_returnClauseSetClauseStatusId

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*The main rule to "cleanse" the input of a WriteRecords SS node to remove non-writable relationships.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable (see that description)
- In the input of a WriteRecords SS (NOT in a previous script task), do:
  A - Expressionable input to "Records" intput
  B - rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord(
    records: pv![the pv to write],
    relationships: {list of record relationships that are not allowed to be written}
  )

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The reason to run this in the input of the WriteRecords SS instead of a previous script task
is that, when used with AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable, you can maintain the relationships
that you had to drop before writing.
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case" but it has a child-relationship "Address" that cannot be written,
    - this will drop "Address" before attempting to write
    - if the output is configured properly it will reattach "Address" in the output
    - the overall result is that you basically ran the node as if "Address" was ignored, 
      so that you can use it later in the process flow
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: a!flatten(ri!records),
  expression: reduce(
    rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord_Reducer(record: _, relationship: _),
    fv!item,
    a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!nonWritableRelationships,
      default: difference(
        rule!AS_GCM_getAllPresentRelationshipsFromRecord(records: fv!item),
        ri!writableRelationships
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_cast

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_buildAuditEntityData

_a-0000e447-91f4-8000-9bc0-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters
_a-0000e447-91f4-8000-9bc0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  auditParams: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_P_AuditProcessParameters'(
    newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!newObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),
    originalObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!originalObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),
    objectTypeNumber: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
    namespace: rule!AS_CO_UT_getTypeNamespace(type: ri!objectType),
    objectDse: ri!objectDse,
    auditDse: ri!auditDse,
    username: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!username,
      replacementValue: loggedInUser()
    ),
    externalAction: ri!externalAction,
    auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
    auditType: ri!auditType,
    manipulationAudit: ri!manipulationAudit,
    complexFieldName: ri!complexFieldName
  )
}

    ri!cdt,

_a-0000eb97-b2e8-8000-9d39-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_IBRValidationDisabled_wrapper

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getAllPresentRelationshipsFromRecord

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs

_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getClauseSetClauseDetails
_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.relationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!relationIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.setId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
    {
      ri!fields,
      if(
        ri!includeRelatedRecords,
        {
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.clauseSet,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.clauseInclusionReason,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.format,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refAddedVia,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refFormat,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refReasonForRemoval,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refStatus,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refUsage,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refClause,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.section
        },
        {}
      )
    }
  ),
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!relationIds),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!setId),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!additionalfilters),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!logicalExpression),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!aggregationFields),
      and(
        ri!getAllRecords = true(),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!fields)
      )
    )
  ),
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)

_a-0000ed5b-ded3-8000-9df2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseSetRelatedActionPlaceholder
_a-0000ed5b-ded3-8000-9df2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!bundle,
    default: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null())
  ),
  {
    if(
      ri!isSmallDialog,
      {},
      {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",
          marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",
          marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
        )
      }

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(
        document: cons!AS_GCM_DOC_CLAUSE_SET_GENERATION_STATE
      ),
      size: "SMALL_PLUS",
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: if(ri!isSmallDialog, "NONE", "EVEN_MORE"),
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: "Clause Set Generation is in progress",
        size: if(ri!isSmallDialog,"STANDARD","MEDIUM")
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "LESS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        size: if(ri!isSmallDialog,"SMALL",""),
        text: "This action will be available once the clause set generation is complete"
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
      buttons: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          label: "Close",
          icon: "close",
          value: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL,
          saveInto: ri!userAction,
          submit: true,
          size: "SMALL",
          style: "SOLID",
          color: "SECONDARY"
        )
      },
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: "STANDARD",
      marginBelow: if(ri!isSmallDialog, "NONE", "EVEN_MORE")
    )
  }
)

_a-0000eb0d-4479-8000-9cfa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_FM_convertOrRevertIbrClauseSetClauses
_a-0000eb0d-4479-8000-9cfa-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!originalClauseSetClause: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getClauseSetClauseDetails(
    relationIds: ri!relationId,
    fields: {
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.setId,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refFormatId,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.formatId,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refStatusId,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.format.refDataId,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refClause.editable,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refClause.fillIn,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refFormatId,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.modifiedDatetime,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.modifiedBy,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.createdDatetime,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.createdBy,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.isActive,
      recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.clauseSet.refStatusId
    },
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!relationId),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  /* Checking whether the clause can be revert back to IBR */
  local!isRevertToIbr: a!match(
    value: local!originalClauseSetClause[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.formatId],
    equals: local!originalClauseSetClause[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refFormatId],
    then: false(),
    equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_IBR,
    then: false(),
    equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_FULL_TEXT,
    then: true(),
    default: false()
  ),
  a!match(
    value: local!originalClauseSetClause[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.clauseSet.refStatusId],
    equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_STATUS_GENERATING,
    then: rule!AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseSetRelatedActionPlaceholder(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      userAction: ri!userAction,
      isSmallDialog: true
    ),
    whenTrue: local!isRevertToIbr,
    then: rule!AS_GCM_FM_confirmationBannerForRelatedActions(
      confirmationHeader: "Revert Full Text to IBR?",
      confirmationMessage: "Converting this clause to included by reference will result in the clause number being included in the clause set document. No additional text will be included. Convert to included by reference?",
      confirmLabel: "Revert",
      cancelLabel: "Cancel",
      confirmSaveInto: {
        a!save(
          ri!clauseSetClause,
          rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
            record: local!originalClauseSetClause,
            alwaysOverwrite: {
              a!map(
                field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.formatId,
                value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_IBR
              ),
              /* Updating this field for audit purposes */
              a!map(
                field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.format.refDataId,
                value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_IBR
              )
            }
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!userAction,
          cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SUBMIT
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!originalClauseSetClause,
          local!originalClauseSetClause
        )
      },
      cancelSaveInto: a!save(
        ri!userAction,
        cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
      )
    ),
    default: rule!AS_GCM_FM_confirmationBannerForRelatedActions(
      confirmationHeader: "Convert IBR to Full Text?",
      confirmationMessage: "Converting this clause to full text will result in the entire text being included in the clause set document. Convert to full text?",
      confirmLabel: "Convert",
      cancelLabel: "Cancel",
      confirmSaveInto: {
        a!save(
          ri!clauseSetClause,
          rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
            record: local!originalClauseSetClause,
            alwaysOverwrite: {
              a!map(
                field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.formatId,
                value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_FULL_TEXT
              ),
              /* Updating this field for audit purposes */
              a!map(
                field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.format.refDataId,
                value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_FULL_TEXT
              )
            }
          )
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!userAction,
          cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SUBMIT
        ),
        a!save(
          ri!originalClauseSetClause,
          local!originalClauseSetClause
        )
      },
      cancelSaveInto: a!save(
        ri!userAction,
        cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
      )
    )
  )
)
